flawed_nl_solution:
1 hour is 60 minutes so 3 hours is 3*60 = <<3*60=180>>180 minutes
Three-quarters of 180 minutes is (3/4)*180 = <<(3/4)*180=153>>153 minutes
He spends 15 minutes on 1 page so he will spend 153 minutes on 153/15 = <<153/15=10.2>>10.2 pages

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 135, not 153. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
